key.name: maximized
key.description: Whether main window is maximized or not

key.name: borderless-window
key.description: Whether to disable window shadow and borders.

key.name: window-controls
key.description: Whether to show window control buttons.

key.name: autohide-header
key.description: Whether to hide headerbar when main window is not focused.

key.name: shortcutless-app
key.description: Whether to disable keyboard shortcuts.

key.name: startup-colors
key.description: Whether to use colors read from a file on startup (overwrites default profile).

key.name: startup-colors-file
key.description: Path to the file that contains the startup colors.

key.name: dbus-colors
key.description: Whether to use colors received through DBus (overwrites default profile).

key.name: dbus-opacity
key.description: Opacity for the colors received through DBus.

key.name: mode
key.description: Defines what the visualizer looks like.

key.name: mirror-offset
key.description: Offset between mirrored images in normal mode

key.name: mirror-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the mirrored image in normal mode

key.name: mirror-colors
key.description: Color profile for mirrored images

key.name: mirror-sync
key.description: Sync mirror color profile with normal color profile

key.name: mirror-clones
key.description: Clones to make in the overlapping mode

key.name: mirror-ratio
key.description: Scale ratio between overlapping clones

key.name: circle
key.description: Whether to modify drawing modes to draw in circle

key.name: wave-inner-circle
key.description: Whether to show the inner circle when using Wave mode Circle variant.

key.name: radius
key.description: Radius of base circle (in percent)

key.name: margin
key.description: Size of gaps around drawing area (in pixels).

key.name: items-offset
key.description: The size of spaces between elements in "levels", "particles" and "bars" modes (in percent).

key.name: items-roundness
key.description: This setting affects "levels", "particles" and "spine" modes.

key.name: line-thickness
key.description: Thickness of lines when filling is off (in pixels).

key.name: fill
key.description: Whether shapes should be filled or outlined.

key.name: bars
key.description: Number of bars in CAVA config

key.name: autosens
key.description: Attempt to decrease sensitivity if the bars peak.

key.name: sensitivity
key.description: Manual sensitivity. If automatic sensitivity is enabled, this will only be the initial value.

key.name: channels
key.description: Mono or stereo

key.name: noise-reduction
key.description: This factor adjusts the integral and gravity filters to keep the signal smooth. 1 will be very slow and smooth, 0 will be fast but noisy.

key.name: widgets-style
key.description: Style used by Adwaita widgets.

key.name: sharp-corners
key.description: Whether the main window corners should be sharp.

key.name: color-animation
key.description: Whether the color animation is active

key.name: color-animation-target
key.description: The target color profile to fade in and out of

key.name: color-animation-mirror-target
key.description: The target color profile to fade in and out of for the mirrored image

key.name: color-animation-length
key.description: The length in seconds of the color animation
